title: Gaetz Gate, Police Using Hypnotism? 4.1.21
itunes:title: Gaetz Gate, Police Using Hypnotism? 4.1.21
description:
In episode 848, Miles and guest host Joelle Smith are joined by comedian Marcella Arguello to discuss Matt Gaetz, Texas discontinuing the use of hypnosis, the NCAA's Supreme Court case, the history of April Fools Day, music festivals coming back, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. TFW Not Even Tucker Carlson Is Buying Matt Gaetz's Sh*t
  2. Texas Rangers stop using hypnosis after Dallas Morning News investigation reveals dubious science
  3. Supreme Court appears willing to side with college athletes against NCAA in compensation case
  4. April Fools’ Day
  5. COVID-19 Concert Cancellation Tracker: Gauging How Long The Event Shutdown Will Last [Updates]
  6. WATCH: Dr. Dre - Forgot About Dre (Smochi & Excez Edit)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
